class_notes: Online synchronous sessions via Zoom. Face-to-face intensives dates: TBD
course_description: This course builds upon evaluation and management of patients across the lifespan in pre-hospital, urgent and emergency care settings. Emphasis on measures to maximize patient safety throughout the emergency care encounter.
prerequisites: NRSG 808D as prerequisite, NRSG 809D and NRSG 810D as co-requisites, or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 1570, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: P. Tucker, Status: Open
